home.title: Rushel & Sivani are getting married
home.welcomeText: We are thrilled to celebrate our special day with our beloved family and friends. Our wedding will be a beautiful blend of Christian and Hindu traditions, reflecting our unique journey and shared love.

christianEvent.title: Christian Ceremony
christianEvent.description: Join us for a beautiful celebration of marriage with traditional Christian customs.

hinduEvent.title: Hindu Ceremony
hinduEvent.description: Experience a vibrant Hindu wedding ceremony full of color and tradition.

christian.title: Christian Ceremony
christian.headline: Join Us for Our Christian Wedding Ceremony
christian.description: We are delighted to invite you to our Christian wedding ceremony. This sacred occasion will be a celebration of our love and commitment to each other, guided by Christian traditions and values.
christian.description2: The ceremony will take place in a beautiful church setting, where we will exchange vows and rings before God and our loved ones. We would be honored to have you witness this special moment in our lives.

arrival.title: Guest Arrival
arrival.description: Please arrive at the church 30 minutes before the ceremony begins.

begins.description: The bride walks down the aisle, accompanied by her father.

vows.title: Exchange of Vows
vows.description: The couple exchange their vows and rings.

pronouncement.title: Pronouncement
pronouncement.description: The couple is pronounced husband and wife.

recessional.title: Recessional
recessional.description: The newlyweds exit the church, followed by the wedding party.

hindu.title: Hindu Ceremony
hindu.headline: Celebrate Our Hindu Wedding Ceremony
hindu.description: We warmly invite you to our traditional Hindu wedding ceremony. This vibrant celebration will honor ancient customs and rituals that symbolize the sacred union of two souls.
hindu.description2: The ceremony will take place in a beautifully decorated mandap, where we will perform various rituals guided by a Hindu priest. Your presence would make this auspicious occasion even more special.

ganeshPuja.description: Prayer to Lord Ganesh to remove obstacles.

mandap.description: The main wedding rituals begin under the mandap.

saptapadi.description: The couple takes seven steps together, making vows.

mangalsutra.title: Mangalsutra
mangalsutra.description: The groom ties the sacred necklace around the bride's neck.

rituals.title: Important Hindu Wedding Rituals
rituals.description: Our Hindu wedding ceremony will include several meaningful rituals that symbolize our commitment and the joining of our families.

mangalPhera.description: The couple circles the sacred fire four times

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is our favorite. Here's a glimpse into our journey from strangers to soulmates.

met.title: How We Met
met.description: We first met at a mutual friend's birthday party. What started as a casual conversation over cake turned into hours of talking about our shared interests and dreams.

firstDate.title: First Date
firstDate.description: After months of friendship, we finally went on our first official date to a local coffee shop. We talked for hours, completely losing track of time.

families.title: Meeting the Families
families.description: We introduced each other to our families. Despite our different cultural backgrounds, both families welcomed us with open arms and open hearts.

proposal.title: The Proposal
proposal.description: During a sunset hike to our favorite viewpoint, surrounded by nature and the golden glow of the setting sun, the question was asked and answered with tears of joy.

engagement.title: Engagement Ceremony
engagement.description: We celebrated our engagement with a beautiful ceremony that blended both our traditions, a perfect representation of our future together.

wedding.title: Our Wedding
wedding.description: And now, we're excited to celebrate the next chapter of our journey with all our loved ones. We can't wait to create more beautiful memories together.

cultures.title: A Union of Cultures
cultures.description1: Our relationship has been a beautiful journey of bridging two different cultures and traditions. We've learned from each other, grown together, and found harmony in our diversity.
cultures.description2: Our wedding will be a celebration of this union, honoring both Christian and Hindu traditions. We invite you to join us in this joyous celebration of love, family, and cultural harmony.

gifts.title: Wedding Gifts
gifts.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we have created a registry for your convenience.

homeFund.title: Home Fund
homeFund.description: Help us build our dream home

note.title: A Note About Gifts
note.description1: We're truly honored that you will be celebrating our special day with us. Your presence is what matters most, and we're grateful for your love and support.
note.description2: If you'd like to give a gift, we hope our registry provides some helpful guidance. We've created options that would be meaningful to us as we start this new chapter together.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Share in our joy by viewing photos from our special day. After the wedding, this section will be filled with cherished moments from both ceremonies. We also invite you to share your own photos here.
